Uses of Class
thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2.WebGLRenderbuffer

  • Packages that use WebGLRenderbuffer 
    Package Description
    thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2
    Here are located all WebGL rendering context related code.
    thothbot.parallax.core.client.textures
    Here are textures which can be used by Materials.

    • Uses of WebGLRenderbuffer in thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2

      Methods in thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2 that return WebGLRenderbuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      WebGLRenderbuffer WebGLRenderingContext.createRenderbuffer()
      Create a WebGLRenderbuffer object and initialize it with a renderbuffer object name as if by calling glGenRenderbuffers.
      Methods in thothbot.parallax.core.client.gl2 with parameters of type WebGLRenderbuffer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void WebGLRenderingContext.bindRenderbuffer(WebGLRenderbuffer buffer)
      Bind a named renderbuffer object.
      void WebGLRenderingContext.deleteRenderbuffer(WebGLRenderbuffer buffer)
      Delete the renderbuffer object contained in the passed WebGLRenderbuffer as if by calling glDeleteRenderbuffers.
      void WebGLRenderingContext.framebufferRenderbuffer(FramebufferSlot attachment, WebGLRenderbuffer renderbuffer)
      Attach a renderbuffer object to a framebuffer object.
      boolean WebGLRenderingContext.isRenderbuffer(WebGLRenderbuffer buffer)
      Return true if the passed RendererObject is a WebGLRenderbuffer and false otherwise.
